C

codeBreaker - Class in <Unnamed>
 
codeBreaker() - Constructor for class codeBreaker
 
countClues - Static variable in class codeBreaker
 
countCurrTurn - Static variable in class codeBreaker
 
createCode(String, int) - Static method in class codeBreaker
Returns an array of some length containing randomly generated characters (representing colours), from a string of colours and an integer representing the amount of colours to generate.

D

displayGame(String[][], String[][]) - Static method in class codeBreaker
Returns a string beginning with headers "Guess" and "Clues", followed by 16 '*', and one column with all the user's guesses and another column with all the clues.

F

findColourCorrect(String[], String[]) - Static method in class codeBreaker
Returns an array containing a "w" for every string in the user input that has the same value as the string in the code but different position.
findFullyCorrect(String[], String[]) - Static method in class codeBreaker
Returns an array containing a "b" for every correctly positioned string in the guess.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class codeBreaker
 

R

remCode - Static variable in class codeBreaker
 
removeFullyCorrect(String[], String[]) - Static method in class codeBreaker
Returns an array that contains the colours that are not in the correct position or not in the code, from the user's guess.

S

SIZE - Static variable in class codeBreaker
 

T

TRIES - Static variable in class codeBreaker
 

V

valid(String[], String, int) - Static method in class codeBreaker
Returns true if the guess is valid (correct size and valid colours entered) or false if the guess is invalid.
